subject: Sign Language
Deafness
Football
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Some football players at the University of Oregon are in the school’s American Sign Language program, where they’ve learned that fans’ use of the “O” sign might be misread.
snippet: Some football players at the University of Oregon are in the school’s American Sign Language program, where they’ve learned that fans’ use of the “O” sign might be misread.
